title.zh: 南昌：血友病女性家属关爱检测公益活动
title.en: Nanchang: Hemophilia Female Family Members Care Testing Charity Activity

subtitle.zh: 携带者检测援助项目与实验室样品分装
subtitle.en: Carrier Testing Assistance Project and Laboratory Sample Aliquoting

description.zh: 南昌血之友公益协会赴丰城市开展血友病女性家属关爱检测公益活动，延续「携带者检测援助」项目，帮助了10个家庭、四十多人、其中24位女性做检测。后续，血友姐妹会左钰洁、何洋帆、姚婷耀、万嘉瑞同学一同在同济医学院实验平台开展样品分装实验。
description.en: Nanchang Hemophilia Association went to Fengcheng City to conduct charity testing activities for female family members of hemophilia patients, continuing the 'Carrier Testing Assistance' project and helping 10 families, more than 40 people, including 24 women with testing. Subsequently, Hemophilia Sisters team members Yujie (Ruby) Zuo, He Yangfan, Yao Tingyao, and Wan Jiarui conducted sample aliquoting experiments together at the Tongji Medical College experimental platform.
